sn35.164:1.3: “Yo kho, kotthika, anatta tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.164:1.5: Cakkhu kho, kotthika, anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.164:1.6: Rupa anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.164:1.7: Cakkhuvinnanam anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.164:1.8: Cakkhusamphasso anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.164:1.9: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.164:1.10: jivha anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.164:1.11: mano anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.164:1.12: Dhamma anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.164:1.15: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anatta; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.164:1.16: Yo kho, kotthika, anatta, tatra te chando pahatabbo”ti.
